runs.comm: slower offcutter to begin from Lasith. On off and Fletcher gets behind the line to block
there is the charge. No sighters needed for Fletcher. He skips down the track with some nimble use of the feet and mis-times an uppish drive on the bounce to mid-off
some swing, nice away movement. But a tad too full from Malinga, swinging away from off. Fletcher keeps it out with minimal feet movement
there is the Malinga special, he looks for the yorker but starts it off a bit too straight , half-volley down leg which beats Fletcher and strikes him on the pads. A muted appeal
good captaincy, slower ball outside off, guided to short third man. Bowling to his own fields is Malinga
misses completely here. Full but well down leg and WI are off
another slower delivery, but this time on a good length outside off, pushed towards point. Fletcher is thinking of one but doesn't get it
no movement. Fullish outside off, skewed off the inside half towards deep midwicket for one
a bit of width from Kulasekara. Fuller than a  good length outside off, Charles pushes the ball towards cover without much feet movement
more assured there but he finds the fielder at cover. Full on off but Charles skips down, converts it into a full toss and creams a drive to cover after giving himself room
change in pace. The slower legcutter goes down leg
whipped from outside off towards deep midwicket/square leg for one. Nice lines these so far from NK.
genuine outside edge flies to short third man. Raced off the outside half after pitching on middle and off and swinging away a touch
smashed. Gives himself room and clobbers the square cut past point. Not a bad delivery but the batsmen pounce on any predictability in this format. Just dances down and moves away
nice change in pace, slower offcutter outside off, chopped back to the keeper
slower delivery again on middle, turned away off his pads towards short fine leg for one

did bother keeping that down, sluggishly trickles to the boundary but Senanayake races across and cuts in just in front of the cover boundary. He does well. Full and swinging away outside off, Fletcher runs down and flays at it but the ball clears the infield off the outside half
shortish on middle and off, slapped to midwicket
Fletcher gets himself in a bit of trouble. Comes down and coverts a half-volley into a full toss. he keeps it out though
slower offcutter outside off, looked like Fletcher picked that up but was in a  bit of indecision. He eventually jabs a pull to deep square leg
nicely done now from NK. Slower delivery, may have been the legcutter but the pace is well off the delivery and Fletcher is through his attempted pull way too early
that is terrific. Unplayable at any time of the innings. Yorker on leg and perfectly executed too. Fletcher somehow digs it out.
no feet movement from Fletcher. That is due to the keeper. Full on leg, inside-edged to short fine leg
slower ball on leg, not a great line but he beats Fletcher again, strikes AF on the pads and then towards square leg
terrific yet again. Just misses the yorker but very full and quick. Charles is hustled for pace but keeps it out with a block
low full toss down leg, clipped towards the deep midwicket region
no turn. Delivered wide outside off, Charles gets down early to sweep but misses
he is struck on the stomach now. He gets down even earlier to play it much finer but the ball skids on from leg and hits him after beating his bat
what a strike that is. Dances down the track, gets close enough to the pitch and pummels a heave over long-on. Goes way back
and another one. This time he executes the sweep well. Gets down early, picks the length and slog sweeps over square leg.
the biggest and finest of em all. That is massive. Runs down and swipes the ball well over the midwicket boundary. Terrific ball-striking this. Unbelievable hitting

and the runs continue. SS goes over the wicket and loops a delivery on off, Charles is already down on one knee and executes a well-timed sweep past square leg. Uppish but wide of the fielder and there are 22 runs in this over.
poor start. Drifts down leg and Fletcher needs to get some bat on that and does so. Races past short fine leg and into the boundary. Runs leaking but some calculated hitting from these openers

wow, it keeps getting better. Just flicks this to the boundary. How strong are those wrists? Not a great delivery, it must be said. Full on leg and Fletcher just times a flick to the midwicket boundary. Speak of change in momentum

and now there is a drop. Should have been taken. Good change in pace by Chameera. Goes slower outside off, Fletcher comes down the track and slashes at that but the ball spoons up towards point. Jayasuriya runs back but is unable to hold on
slowish again on leg, pushed defensively with soft hands towards midwicket
full toss now down leg, kisses Charles' pads and then into the fine leg boundary. losing his length after a couple of good deliveries
another extra. Full down leg, and another wide
good stop by Kusal. Saved a few runs there. Goes wider of the crease but the ball slings down leg. Kusal dives across and keeps it in
and it is four more. The second successive over going for 22. Short and wide, begging to be hit. Why not, says Fletcher. Stays in his crease and crunches a cut past point.
comes in with the arm on middle, pushed towards midwicket

and he has struck. Siriwardana is the man yet again to provide the breakthrough. fantastic delivery. Tosses one up with insufficient air, pitches on off and skids on to middle. Fletcher tries to nudge to midwicket but misses and is truck right in front. Easy decision for the umpire.
whacked. Poor delivery. Long hop on leg, Samuels goes back and pulls fiercely to deep square leg

not a great delivery to be honest. But it is a direct hit. Has Samuels made it?He hasnt. Good intent from Marlon Samuels but he was too slow in that second run. And he has to go. Full down leg, the ball clips the pad and then towards the fine leg boundary. Jayasuriya runs across, keeps it in and throws the stumps down from the boundary. What a piece of fielding that is. Match-turning stuff. From the boundary he effects a direct hit and a run out. Not enough time for the keeper to collect and whip off the bails so Jayasuriya does it himself.
skids on with the arm on leg, off the pad towards deep square leg
full on leg, clipped to deep square leg
full on leg, Bravo pushes this with soft hands towards deep midwicket. He wants the second but is sent back.
fired in flat on middle. Whipped to deep midwicket
darted in on leg, Bravo nudges this towards deep square leg. And the ball is in the gap, allowing two.
Pushed towards the bowler off the back foot who makes a good diving stop
full and fast on leg, turned to deep midwicket. A lull in play at the moment.
fast on leg, no room. Charles rocks back and pushes to deep midwicket
flatter outside off, skids on yet gain. Chopped off the back foot to point
interesting running. Low full toss on middle, Fletcher gets down early and sweeps to short fine leg. The throw is quick but inaccurate and Bravo makes it home
oh, nice shot. Makes a bit of room outside off and crunches an impeccably timed drive past cover
full and fast but down leg
quick outside off, quelled to cover
tossed up but ends up as a yorker. Full on off and Charles yorks himself. Keeps it out
Milinda is running through the top order. Skids on with the arm and strikes Charles on the back foot, absolutely plumb. He misses a straight one and has to go. Wickets falling quickly
fired down on leg, turned delicately towards the fine leg boundary. The slow outfield pulls this back in
full on middle and leg, nudged to deep midwicket
fired in on off, defended.
full on leg, just driven calmly to long-on
low full toss on middle, Bravo is happy to flick to midwicket
flat and short on off, Russell flat-bats a pull to deep midwicket. Good over there
skiddy delivery on leg, Russell has offered the full face to defend
makes a bit of room and drives to cover.
low full toss now on leg, squeezed to short fine leg
flight and loop on middle, driven with the little bit of spin to long-off
skids down leg for another extra
lots of air and slower through the air too. Full on off, and Bravo drives to long-off
slog-swept for six. Russell is firing up his engines. He has had enough. Tossed up on leg, he gets down early, gets underneath the ball and clatters it way back over the midwicket boundary.
good length on middle, 140.6 ks, solidly defended off the back foot by Bravo
six more. Cannot have a block in his form of the game. Bravo makes up for it with a terrific strike. Goes back and clobbers a pull over long-on in typical Bravo fashion .
dabbed to third man with the open face

big wicket. Very big wicket. Russell has to go. Short on leg, Russell stays in his crease and goes for the pull, but the ball is a bit too high to control. A bit of  a top-edge goes towards fine leg where Chandimal settles under it and takes a good catch, never easy to take.
fullish on leg, hits Bravo on the pad and then back to the bowler
another well-executed slower ball. Good length on middle drawing a forward block by Bravo
tossed up on middle, slower through the air. Pushed with the spin to deep midwicket
short outside off giving Bravo a lot of time to rock back and flat-bat a drive to deep cover
flighted on leg, Ramdin pushes with soft hands towards deep square leg, well enough to  get two
clipped off his pads into the leg side
short on middle, Bravo backs away and flays a cut to extra cover. No run
good idea but doesn't execute that well. Flighted outside leg, Bravo works this towards midwicket with discernibly soft hands and he wants two. But he doesn't hit it hard enough
fired in on leg, worked to deep square leg. Good fielding from Chameera prevents the second
flat on leg yet again, chipped to deep midwicket
very fast and wide outside off, good variation in line. Bravo fails to connect with this cut
straight on middle, cut towards point for a quick single
slog swept for six more. Gets underneath it does Ramdin and heaves this full, fast delivery on leg over the square leg boundary.
and a repeat. Although, this one doesn't go as fat back. A bit of flight on middle and leg, right in the hitting arc and Ramdin obliges. Gets down and swipes another sis over deep square leg
a bit of flight on middle, Bravo execute well now. Nurdles this with soft hands towards deep midwicket for a couple
quick on off, this time Bravo settles for the one. Nudges this to deep square leg
a bit streaky but why won't he take it. Flatter and full outside off, Ramdin comes down and looks to go back down the ground but smears it off the inside half to deep midwicket for four.
flatter on middle now, nudged to deep midwicket off his pads. Really clever batting
wants the two again but hits it too hard. Flat on leg, turned to deep square leg
another wild hoick, flat on off, pulls the length back a tad which is responsible for that drag to deep mdiwicket
quick yorker, Ramdin gets an angled bat down on it just in time, rolls to fine leg
Bravo backs away, to the left-handers tramline but NK follows him with a good slower delivery. Cut to point for one

top-edge and dropped. Ran past it did Chameera.  Not an easy catch at all. Low full toss down leg, Ramdin chooses the sweep but the ball takes the top edge and lobs to fine leg. Chameera ran across and just about got a hand on it, almost ran in too fast
swiped to long-on off the front foot, another slower delivery
low full toss down leg, Bravo works this to deep midwicket
too good. Perfectly-executed yorker on middle, Ramdin can only keep it out with a block to the bowler
terriifc yorker on leg, Bravo pushes this to long-on but the pair put pressure on the fielder by racing for the first. A fumble allows them the second
full on middle and leg, Bravo backs away and thrashes a ball to deep cover along the ground
slower offcutter outside off, chopped to cover
nice from Malinga. Years of experience coming to the fore. Slung in wide outside off on a fuller length, Bravo backs away and reaches for that but doesn't get bat on it

Mathews makes a tough catch looks simple. Again, the round-arm action takes the ball away from Bravo who looks to hoick that into the leg side but the ball skews into the air towards cover off the outside half of the bat. Mathews runs back and completes a really good catch in front of his chest.
low full toss on middle, pushed to long-on for just the single
slower legcutter on middle and off, Ramdin gives himself room and chops a cut to point. They complete a quick run
good length on off, KP runs down with some arrogance and pushes this to midwicket
excellent from Kulasekara. Inch-perfect yorker on off, Ramdin keeps it out and wants one but NK is quick on it, ensuring Pollard cannot get on strike
and again, a bit leg side-ish now, squeezed to fine leg off the inside edge
slower ball outside off, Pollard clips this towards long-on for a couple. Good running
charges at the bowler again to shorten the length, Hayden-esque. Whips the ball to fine leg with soft hands and they come back for the second again
good delivery yet again, yorker or just about on middle, Ramdin squirts this to midwicket

and that bail has been removed. Just too good, nothing Pollard can do about it. An inch-perfect yorker and even a  finisher as good as Pollard cannot do much with that. Sneaks under the bat of Pollard to hit the off stump. Just losing their momentum a touch here
does pretty well. Acknowledges the expertise of Malinga, he is happy with the one. Slower ball outside off, Sammy gets an inside edge for one. Was always looking for the one
another slower offcutter, outside off and slapped to deep cover. Both sides will be happy with that result, I presume
splendid stuff, another good slower ball on leg. D Sammy stays inside the line and pushes to cover. Just another single
good decision. But what an over and what a spell from Malinga. Full yorker down leg, Ramdin misses his slog and is struck down leg. Huge appreal but the umpire makes the right call under pressure
full on middle, misses the yorker actually and that shpould have been put away but Ramdin was unable to get under that enough and just pushes the ball to long-off
stunning fielding, slower ball on middle and Sammy swings at that and finds the gap in front of deep square leg. Chandi runs around and pulls it in, keeps them down to two.
that will be four for sure. Slower delivery outside off, slapped in front of cover for four. Picked his gap and good execution

Sammy got under a length delivery there and the crowd goes wild. That was fairly dangerous. Sammy misjudges the length totally and takes his eyes off it and tries to get under it but somehow gets some bat on it
smeared to midwicket for two. Good length on middle, Sammy cannot find the boundary. Mis-times his pull to that region but is able to get two
not a bad result for SL. Good length on middle and Sammy short-arm jabs that to deep midwicket. He always wanted two and makes it with a full-length dive.
